Band, BPA, FFA, 7-12 Yearbook, and HS Student Council.

div.a: Severe Pulmonary Illness Linked to Vaping

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

ul.li: View the Surgeon General's Advisory on E-Cigarette Use Among Youth

h3.div: We will show respect for others and their possessions.
We will keep hands, feet, and other objects to ourselves.
We will allow the teacher to teach, and other students to learn.
We will listen to, and cooperate with ALL school staff.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: "The Mission of the Covington Schools is to provide an excellent educational foundation that prepares our students to become productive and responsible citizens."

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/M4T-Z2ww9iTuoh5ToKujMQ-vcAZOyqNCQ7TO0Gv15eaygsevO3tP2_yp4Qan2ClSpJXWisZB=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving, and tolerant of the weak and the strong - because someday you will have been all of these.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: Questions - Comments - Concerns Please contact harrisonm@covingtonk12.org
